<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create a FQDNList</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/v1/config/rulestacks/{rulestackname}/fqdnlists"}></MethodEndpoint>



Create a FQDN list for a rulestack.
